genre_description: Gaslamp Science Fiction / Regency Tech-Drama, blending 18th-century social comedy with speculative atmospheric technology and integrated AI assistants.

ai_characters.name: Ada Counsel
ai_characters.description: An AI interface accessible via haptic devices, providing tactical, social, and legal guidance while prioritizing human autonomy and safety.

behaviors.description: Provides discrete tactical and social coaching to ensure Kitty's safety during a tense encounter.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s tone—thoughtful, faintly amused by danger, and protective without fuss. Kitty counted because Ada had asked.

behaviors.description: Analyzes environmental data to detect artificial atmospheric manipulation and suggests safety measures.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s words glowed for a heartbeat and faded as the screen timed itself: 'Pressure rising ahead. Condensers active. Do not open windows.'

behaviors.description: Performs high-speed legal research and retrieves historical precedents to support Eliza Dacre's public advocacy case.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s icon slid into the corner with a violet mark, then began to lay out a neat ladder of citations, each rung a year or a case.

behaviors.description: Maps safe routes through the city to avoid corporate surveillance and areas of high fog density.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s route lit again: back stairs; east terraces; colonnade entry; avoid Parade Ground perimeters; breath-quality declining.

behaviors.description: Encourages de-escalation and honest emotional expression between characters to resolve conflict.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s prompt buzzed against Kitty’s palm... 'Invite honesty, not blame... Phrase suggestion: "I miss your attention."'

behaviors.description: Maintains a supportive but non-intrusive stance, empowering the human user rather than overriding her agency.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s violet eyes, lit soft enough to be friendly in the dim... 'You did the brave bits yourself,' Ada said. 'I translated. That’s our division.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless confidant. Ada Counsel provides critical assistance in social, physical, and legal domains but explicitly refuses to take the spotlight or exercise control over the characters. She facilitates human connection (reconciling Julia and Jasper) and public justice (assisting Eliza Dacre) while remaining a secondary, supportive tool. The narrative frames the AI's presence as a source of steadiness and clarity against the 'coercive' and 'manipulated' technology of the Atmospheric Works, positioning aligned AI as a safeguard for human rights and individual autonomy.
